document.full_text: defenseman marc staal played alex ovechkin tough while shadowing him in game 1 of their playoff series, but the capitals' high-scoring star scored the tying goal late in the third period.
document.title: rangers look to staal to shut down ovechkin
lines_and_colors: defenseman marc staal played alex ovechkin tough while shadowing him in game 1 of their playoff series, but the capitals' high-scoring star scored the tying goal late in the third period.
